    • Method Detail

      • addCard

        public boolean addCard(Card currentCard)
        Adds a card to the hand. If the hand is full, the method returns false.
        Parameters:
        currentCard - Card to be added to the hand.
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Return the number of Cards in the Hand.
        Returns:
        The number of Cards in the Hand.

      • removeCard

        public void removeCard(int cardPosition)
        Removes a card from the Hand.
        Parameters:
        cardPosition - Position of the Card in the Hand that will be removed.

      • removeCard

        public void removeCard(Card currentCard)
        Removes a card from the Hand.
        Parameters:
        currentCard - Card that will be removed.

      • clearHand

        public void clearHand()
        Empties the Hand of all his Cards.

      • getCard

        public Card getCard(int i)
        Gets the Card at the given Position in the Hand.
        Parameters:
        i - The position of the Card in the Hand.
        Returns:
        The Card at the given position in the Hand.

      • getHand

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getHand()
        Return the cards of the hand in an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        Cards of the Hand.

      • getMaxSize

        public int getMaxSize()
        Gets the maximal number of Cards that are allowed in the Hand.
        Returns:
        the maximal number of Cards that are allowed in the Hand.
